org.numenta.nupic.model

Class DistalDendrite

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.numenta.nupic.model.Segment
      • org.numenta.nupic.model.DistalDendrite

  • public class DistalDendrite
extends Segment
    Represents a proximal or distal dendritic segment. Segments are owned by Cells and in turn own Synapses which are obversely connected to by a "source cell", which is the Cell which will activate a given Synapse owned by this Segment.
    Author:
    Chetan Surpur, David Ray

      • createSynapse

        public Synapse createSynapse(Connections c,
                             Cell sourceCell,
                             double permanence,
                             int index)
        Creates and returns a newly created Synapse with the specified source cell, permanence, and index.
        Parameters:
        c - the connections state of the temporal memory
        sourceCell - the source cell which will activate the new Synapse
        permanence - the new Synapse's initial permanence.
        index - the new Synapse's index.
        Returns:

        Parameters:

      • getConnectedActiveSynapses

        public java.util.Set<Synapse> getConnectedActiveSynapses(java.util.Map<DistalDendrite,java.util.Set<Synapse>> activeSynapsesForSegment,
                                                         double permanenceThreshold)
        Returns the synapses on a segment that are active due to lateral input from active cells.
        Parameters:
        activeSynapsesForSegment - Set of this Segment's active Synapses
        permanenceThreshold - Threshold at which a is considered connected.
        Returns:
        Set of connected Synapses

      • adaptSegment

        public void adaptSegment(Connections c,
                         java.util.Set<Synapse> activeSynapses,
                         double permanenceIncrement,
                         double permanenceDecrement)
        Called for learning Segments so that they may adjust the permanences of their synapses.
        Parameters:
        c - the connections state of the temporal memory
        activeSynapses - a set of active synapses owned by this Segment which will have their permanences increased. All others will have their permanences decreased.
        permanenceIncrement - the increment by which permanences are increased.
        permanenceDecrement - the increment by which permanences are decreased.

      • pickCellsToLearnOn

        public java.util.Set<Cell> pickCellsToLearnOn(Connections c,
                                              int numPickCells,
                                              java.util.Set<Cell> prevWinners,
                                              java.util.Random random)
        Returns a Set of previous winner Cells which aren't already attached to any Synapses owned by this Segment
        Parameters:
        c - the connections state of the temporal memory
        numPickCells - the number of possible cells this segment may designate
        prevWinners - the set of previous winner cells
        random - the random number generator
        Returns:
        a Set of previous winner Cells which aren't already attached to any Synapses owned by this Segment
